sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners

Interface ListenerProvider.Builder

  • Enclosing interface:
    ListenerProvider

    public static interface ListenerProvider.Builder
    A builder for creating listener provider instances.

    Builder instances can be reused, it is safe to call build() multiple times to build multiple listener providers in series.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListenerProvider.Builder add(java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> implementation)
      Adds listener implementation to the built listener provider.
      ListenerProvider.Builder addAll(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Class<? extends Listener>> implementations)
      Adds each listener implementation to the built listener provider, ignoring duplicate elements.
      ListenerProvider build()
      Returns a newly created listener provider.
      ListenerProvider.Builder parent(ListenerProvider provider)
      Sets the parent listener provider of the built listener provider.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        ListenerProvider.Builder add(java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> implementation)
        Adds listener implementation to the built listener provider. If the listener provider already contains given implementation, then this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        implementation - the listener type to add, not null
        Returns:
        this Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if type is null

      • addAll

        ListenerProvider.Builder addAll(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Class<? extends Listener>> implementations)
        Adds each listener implementation to the built listener provider, ignoring duplicate elements.
        Parameters:
        implementations - the listener types to add
        Returns:
        this Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if implementations is null or contains a null element

      • parent

        ListenerProvider.Builder parent(ListenerProvider provider)
        Sets the parent listener provider of the built listener provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - the parent provider, not null
        Returns:
        this Builder object
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the provider is null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the provider is already set

      • build

        ListenerProvider build()
        Returns a newly created listener provider.
